title: GitHub Secret Sanitization Strategy
description: Successfully implemented GitHub integration strategy for ChatGPT5 analysis. Created template files (.env.template, .mcp.json.template) to sanitize secrets while maintaining local development capabilities. Used git filter-branch and orphan branches to create clean repository history without exposing API keys.

solution.description: Complete methodology documented: 1) Created template files (.env.template, .mcp.json.template) with placeholder values, 2) Used git filter-branch --tree-filter to sanitize history, 3) Created orphan branches for clean repository state, 4) Maintained local development through .env.local.backup and claude-backups/ restoration, 5) Successfully prepared repository for ChatGPT5 analysis while preserving all 15 MCP servers functionality. Repository now AI-analysis ready without credential exposure.
